main.name: Abhishek Sharma
description: Quickly adopt new technologies and tools
Curious about new possibilities and act to explore them
bio: I am a Software Engineer, specialising in the web development arena. For the last 2 years, I have been developing websites using React JS, .Net Core and SQL.

I’m currently employed as Software Development Engineer at Policybazaar.com. I have hands on in all stages of the software development cycle, from planning and design to testing and deployment. No two days are the same for me, my tasks may involve analysing algorithms, altering code, fixing bugs, brainstorming ideas or integrating new systems

Something that I love about software development is the opportunity to work with people from a wide range of disciplines. The software development lifecycle involves working with so many different people and departments and, as a people person and someone who loves to build new relationships, it’s great to be able to come together with other professionals who are striving towards the same goal.

education.school: Department Of Computer Science, University Of Delhi
Deen Dayal Upadhyaya College, University Of Delhi

work.title: Software Development Engineer
description: System helps agents to coordinate with the customers regarding their policies
Building Rest Api's using .Net Framework framework
Developed a new application using ReactJS & .Net for email sending/view and email template creation
Developed a widget to raise/update/view the medical requirements of the customers for their term life policies
Developed a new component to show Renewal details card and automate the communication of renewal system
Developed a dashboard to view the logs stored in MongoDB, this enhanced the productivity of product team to analyse logs
Debugging and Resolving Bugs in Product, to ensure Proper and optimal working
.Net Core, MVC, N-Layered Architecture, React JS, SQL, Mongo DB, Redis, C#

work.company: Nagarro Software Pvt. Ltd, Gurugram, India
work.title: Software Development Engineer (Intern)
description: Acquired knowledge of C# to start working with .NET Core
Gained understanding of working according to the company standards
Created web based projects using n-layered and microservice architecture
Developed a web-based application to book bus tickets and provided live tracking of bus seats availability between the stations
Debugging and Resolving Bugs in Production environment, to ensure Proper and optimal working
